Submodules

autoop.core.ml.model.model module

class autoop.core.ml.model.model.Model(type: str = None)[source]

Bases: ABC

Base class for all models used in the assignment.

abstract fit(observations: ndarray, ground_truth: ndarray) → None[source]

Train the model based on the observations and labels (ground_truth). :param observations: data to fit on :param ground_truth: labels of the observations

property hyperparameters: dict

Returns a copy of hyperparameters to prevent leakage.

property parameters: dict

Returns a copy of parameters to prevent leakage.

abstract predict(observations: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Make predictions based on the observations. :param observations: data to make predictions on :returns: predictions made by the model

to_artifact(name: str) → Artifact[source]

Convert the model to an artifact. :param name: name of the artifact :returns: Artifact

property type: str

Returns the model type.

property validate_hyperparameters: int

Getter for the validator so that the user can check the allowed range. Returns a deepcopy as functions are mutable. :returns: validator

Module contents

This package contains all models.

autoop.core.ml.model.get_model(model_name: str) → Model[source]

Factory method to get a model by name. :param model_name: Name of the model to get :return: Model object
